summary: User Profile & Address Manager Module Testing Complete. Backend 22/22 passed. Frontend Profile Page and Checkout Page with saved addresses fully functional.
critical_code_review_comments: Phone validation correctly enforces 10-digit Indian format starting with 6-9
Max 5 addresses limit properly enforced with clear error message
Default address functionality works - setting new default correctly unsets others
Checkout page auto-selects default address and auto-checks pincode
Address dropdown shows all saved addresses with DEFAULT badge on default
Save address from checkout checkbox shows label selector (Home/Work/Other)
Manage Addresses link on checkout navigates to profile page
Email field correctly disabled on profile page
Address cards show edit, delete, and set-default actions
seed_data_creation: Test user has 2 saved addresses: Home (400001) and Work (400002)
context_for_next_testing_agent: User Profile & Address Manager fully tested. Profile page has tabbed layout (Profile Info, Saved Addresses). Checkout page shows address selector when user has saved addresses. Phone validation: 10-digit starting 6-9. Pincode validation: 6 digits. Max 5 addresses enforced.
